item.title: Gregory add a quote by Sharon Olds
item.description: "I was a late bloomer. But anyone who blooms at all, ever, is very lucky. " -- Sharon Olds

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Jill McCorkle
item.description: "If a nuclear disaster occurred, and you had to live out those final painful days just stretched out somewhere thinking about your life--This is who I am. This is what I love. This is what I believe--who would you want hearing your whispers? Or perhaps better: Who do you trust to hear your whispers? Whose breath do you want mingled with your own? Whose flesh still warm beside you?" -- Jill McCorkle

item.title: Gregory add a quote by Vaclav Havel
item.description: "I feel that the dormant goodwill in people needs to be stirred. People need to hear that it makes sense to behave decently or to help others, to place common interests above their own, to respect the elementary rules of human coexistence." -- Vaclav Havel
